SA05n852:9: klīṃ ḍāṃ klīṃ ḍāṃ ninādairvaradahanabhuvi kṣetrapaḥ pātu yuṣmān || 2 ||
SA05n852:10: kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣāntimūrtiḥ kalakalakalakṛt kṣāntivṛddhiṃ prakurvan |
SA05n852:12: hrīṃ śrīṃ klīṃ mantradehaḥ paca paca dahanairjātamantraḥ samantād
SA05n852:18: khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ khaṅgapāṇirlalalalalalito rūpato raktapāṇiḥ
SA05n852:19: raṃ raṃ raṃ raktanetro ru ru rudhirakaraścarcitaścaṇḍavegaḥ |
SA05n852:20: kruṃ kruṃ kruṃ krodhadṛṣṭiḥ kuha kuha kuṭilaḥ kuñcitāśeṣaduṣṭaḥ
SA05n852:21: ḍaṃ ḍaṃ ḍaṃ ḍāmarāṅgo ḍamarukasahito rakṣatāt kṣetrapālaḥ || 5 ||
SA05n852:22: yaṃ yaṃ yaṃ yāti viśvaṃ yamaniyamayuto yāmino'yāmino vā
SA05n852:23: vaṃ vaṃ vaṃ vātavego jhaṭiti karakadhṛt prāptalokopacāraḥ |
SA05n852:24: bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhrūṃ bhīṣaṇāṅgo bhṛkuṭikṛtabhayo muktivān sādhakānāṃ
SA05n852:25: kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣaṃ kṣemakārī kṣapayatu duritaṃ rakṣatāt kṣetrapālaḥ || 6 ||
SA05n852:26: klāṃ klāṃ klāṃ krāntimūrtistribhuvanamaniśaṃ kledayan sarvadā yaḥ
SA05n852:27: paṃ paṃ paṃ pāśahastaḥ paraśudhṛtakaraḥ pālayan pālanīyān |
SA05n852:30: klīṃ klīṃ klīṃ kṛttivāsā kṛtaripuniyamaḥ kleśitānāṃ sadeśaḥ
SA05n852:31: kaṃ kaṃ kaṃ kapālamālī kalikaluṣaharaḥ kālavṛndābhakāyaḥ |
SA05n852:32: caṃ caṃ caṃ caṇḍavegaḥ pracaritasamayāḥ kālabhūtaikalokaḥ
SA05n852:33: saṃ saṃ saṃ saṃyatātmā samayaśubhaphalaṃ lakṣyatāṃ pātu yuṣmān || 8 ||
SA05n852:35: ācāryaḥ sādhako vā japati ca niyataṃ puṇyavān jāyate'sau |
SA05n852:36: āyuḥ śrīḥ kīrtilakṣmīrdhṛtibalamatulaṃ śāntipuṣṭī prabhā ca
SA05n852:37: sarvajñatvaṃ ca nityaṃ dinaniśamatulaṃ naśyate vighnajātam || 9 ||
